verses.name: Acts 17:23
verses.text: For as I passed by, and beheld your devotions, I found an altar with this inscription, TO THE UNKNOWN GOD. Whom therefore ye ignorantly worship, him declare I unto you.

verses.name: Acts 17:24
verses.text: God that made the world and all things therein, seeing that he is Lord of heaven and earth, dwelleth not in temples made with hands;

verses.name: Acts 17:25
verses.text: Neither is worshipped with men’s hands, as though he needed any thing, seeing he giveth to all life, and breath, and all things;
